abstract: Pinger, one of the most successful of the start-up app developers, is rolling out a new voice calling service for the iPod touch and iPhone, aiming to challenge Skype and others by offering free or low-cost phones calls.
snippet: Pinger, one of the most successful of the start-up app developers, is rolling out a new voice calling service for the iPod touch and iPhone, aiming to challenge Skype and others by offering free or low-cost phones calls.
lead_paragraph: Pinger, a developer of applications, is rolling out a new voice calling service for the iPod touch and iPhone, aiming to challenge Skype and others by offering free or low-cost phones calls, Reuters reported.

abstract: Google has been told by Dave McClure to get out the checkbook and buy Twitter: “Whatever your math is, you better do it soon, because you’re getting killed by Facebook.”
snippet: Google has been told by Dave McClure to get out the checkbook and buy Twitter: “Whatever your math is, you better do it soon, because you’re getting killed by Facebook.”
lead_paragraph: Dave McClure has some advice for Google: Get out the checkbook and buy Twitter — and make it snappy.

abstract: It seems the rumors that Apple’s chief operating officer, Tim Cook, was ditching his job at the company to take the top post at Hewlett-Packard were just that: rumors.
snippet: It seems the rumors that Apple’s chief operating officer, Tim Cook, was ditching his job at the company to take the top post at Hewlett-Packard were just that: rumors.
lead_paragraph: It seems the rumors that Apple‘s chief operating officer, Tim Cook, was ditching his job at the company to take the top post at Hewlett-Packard were just that: rumors.

headline.main: Apple Shares Slide as Rumor Mill Strikes Again
